txt.en: Banners of the Lady of Blight
Banners of the Stained can be found in Seregost's courtyards and terraces.\n\nYou should destroy banners of the Stained.

A note is pinned to the board, written in a loose script:

'[placeholder],
Hope you are doing well. Faeron told me you and other adventurers would be checking these boards. Should you make your way back into Seregost, you should make an effort to remove any of Lhaereth's banners that you find. I believe this will help demoralize our opponents, making the fight a little easier. 

Good luck out there,
Rhadrog'
Banners bearing the symbol of Lhaereth the Stained fly in Seregost's courtyards and terraces. They should be destroyed in defiance.
